attributes.action: make it mandatory - NOT voluntary - for all members of the royal family to pay income tax at the appropriate rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should they be exempt?  They became members of that family simply by accident of birth; they could just as easily have been born into the poorest family in the country.  Some of them work very hard?  So do many on the minimum wage and they have no choice about paying tax; on a yearly income probably not much less - if at all - than the weekly income of even the most minor royal.  This petition was inspired by seeing news reports that Prince Charles had had a RISE of £1 million; how long would most tax-paying workers have to work to earn this?
